metadata.title: CVE-2024-8237 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: A Denial of Service (DoS) issue has been discovered in GitLab CE/EEaffecting all versions prior to 12.6 prior to 17.4.5, 17.5 prior to 17.5.3,and 17.6 prior to 17.6.1. An attacker could cause a denial of service witha crafted cargo.toml file.

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
